flowRoot.flowPara: You draw... aim... TWANG! Your arrow strikes a hairy gnome for 8 damage!
You draw another arrow from your quiver.
The gnome chieftain stabs darksatanic with a spear for 8 damage!
darksatanic swings at the gnome chieftain, who neatly sidesteps the blow.
A hairy gnome kicks Ulag Gnrok for 1 damage!
You draw... aim... TWANG! Your arrow strikes a hairy gnome for 12 damage!
You draw another arrow from your quiver.
